Mitigations: mTLS/JWT with strict aud/iss; IP allowlist; private network
Redis ACL; AUTH; private net; disable dangerous cmds; backups
Central append-only logs; correlate with gatekeeper audit id

Threat: Leak of flags via control-plane error or logs
Mitigations: No secrets in logs; error boundaries; secret scanning in CI
Rate limiting; resource quotas; scan windows; ephemeral env

Threat: Realm RCE lateral movement to other realms
Mitigations: Per-realm bridge nets; gatekeeper single bridge; host firewall
Target allowlist; deny private CIDRs; egress filters
Mask secrets; least-privilege tokens; OIDC federation

Threat: Unauthorized access to admin endpoints in DAST_MODE
Mitigations: Bind to private iface; authz; DAST_MODE guard
